issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #1
issues.description: THE BISHOP'S MAN, PART 1 OF 3 Continued from All-New Hawkeye #5 Hawkeye and Hawkeye take aim at another season. But it's not all straight as an arrow for Clint and Kate. A deep-seated rift that stretches across time, brings...

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #1
issues.description: WUNDERKAMMER, PART 1 OF 5 Follows Hawkeye #22 THE AVENGING ARCHERS ARE BACK! Hawkeye returns in an all-new series featuring superstar writer Jeff Lemire in his Marvel debut and Eisner Award-winning artist Ramon Perez, as...

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #2
issues.description: THE BISHOP'S MAN, PART 2 OF 3 A reluctantly reunited team Hawkeye struggles to rebuild trust and rectify past mistakes. But they're put through the ringer when their mission brings them face to face with The Mandarin! It's...

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #2
issues.description: WUNDERKAMMER, PART 2 Arrows over Bed-Stuy! Intrigue at the circus! The past and present merge as Hawkeyes Barton and Bishop race against time to save a group of innocent kids, with devastating powers.

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #3
issues.description: THE BISHOP'S MAN, PART 3 OF 3 Caught in the Crosshairs of time! Old-man Clint and an aged Kate have finally tracked down PROJECT COMMUNION. But even with help from two of Kate's Young Avengers teammates, liberating the FROG...

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #3
issues.description: WUNDERKAMMER, PART 3 What makes a hero and what breaks a hero? Hawkeye and Hawkeye experience both. In ONE GLORIOUSLY BEAUTIFUL ISSUE!

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #4
issues.description: HAWKEYES, PART 1 OF 3 It's a brand-new adventure all about Kate-Hawkeye! A sneak peek into Kate's past reveals more about her mysterious father. Back in the present, Clint leads a S.H.I.E.L.D. team to rescue the kids from...

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #4
issues.description: WUNDERKAMMER, PART 4 The past and the present collide as a young Clint and an older Hawkeye attempt to save whatever innocence they have left.

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #5
issues.description: HAWKEYES, PART 2 OF 3 Hawkeye vs. Hawkeye! For the last few months, Clint and Kate have been at odds with one another. With this issue, that all comes to a head! Flashbacks continue to explore Kate's childhood and what led...

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #5
issues.description: WUNDERKAMMER, PART 5 A boy at odds with his big brother. A hero out of sync with his partner. Team Hawkeye, both past and present, is fractured. Things come to a head as Barney, Clint, and Kate learn what it means to carry...

issues.name: All-New Hawkeye #6
issues.description: HAWKEYES, PART 3 OF 3 A young Kate Bishop understands the kind of man her father truly is. A wiser Clint Barton gives his all to prove that he’s someone Kate can trust. This climatic story forever redefines what it means...

issues.description: ANNIHILATION's Cammi vs. Deathlocket! AVENGER ACADEMY's Hazmat vs. Deathlocket! Who the heck is Deathlocket? And who dies in this issue? Plus: Who are the students of the Braddock Academy?

issues.name: Avengers Arena #3
issues.description: X-23 vs. ANNIHILATION's Cammi! A mystery opponent vs. AVENGERS ACADEMY's Sentinel! Who is the killer stalking the competitors in their sleep? Plus: Darkhawk equals death!

issues.name: Avengers Arena #4
issues.description: The Runaways vs. Avengers Academy!

issues.name: Avengers Arena #5
issues.description: The Braddock Academy vs...themselves?

issues.description: Betrayal! Secrets! Murder! Shock follows shock in the stunning conclusion to our first story arc! Who will win the race to the supplies... and what are they willing to do get there first? Who is not what they seem... and...

issues.description: CONTINUUM CONUNDRUM PART 5 DOC'S STORY! Is he a man out of time? A visitor from another reality? An alien? A robot? Eighteen hyper-intelligent hamsters in a rubber human suit? Well, definitely not the last one--but the...

issues.name: Back to the Future #11
issues.description:
END OF THE ROAD!
	Continuum Conundrum crashes to a conclusion! Trapped in 2036 with a furious Griff Tannen-and Doc's only way to reunite with Clara means abandoning Marty to this terrifying future!

issues.name: Back to the Future #12
issues.description: NEEDLES' STORY! In a special one-off event, delve into the secret history of one of Marty McFly's most persistent pests, Needles! What made that kid into the troublemaker we all know and despise?

issues.name: Back to the Future #13
issues.description: HARD TIME PART 1! An all-new epic starts here! With life safe and normal for Marty McFly-what could possibly go wrong? How about... a little bit of everything? Who's out to get Marty, and more importantly, why?!

issues.name: Back to the Future #14
issues.description: WHO IS MARTY MCFLY? That's what Marty's asking himself, as it becomes abundantly clear his childhood memories don't match up with what actually happened in this timeline. How can he and Doc Brown fix things without breaking...

issues.name: Back to the Future #15
issues.description: WHO IS MARTY McFLY?! He’s the guy caught in a timestorm, that’s who. Reality is shifting, and Marty and Doc not only don’t know why or how… they don’t even know that it’s happening. Who else has a time machine… and why is...

issues.name: Back to the Future #16
issues.description: WHO IS MARTY McFLY?!? And why are there so many on the loose in 1986?! Marty and Doc finally get some answers, but they might not like where those answer take them... and they're definitely not going to like WHEN it takes...

issues.name: Back to the Future #17
issues.description: WHO IS MARTY MCFLY-CONCLUSION! Too many Martys... but only one can survive. Or can he? Time travel gets confusing! But this issue provides all the mind-bending answers as Doc and Marty try to get out of the future-and figure...

issues.name: Back to the Future #18

issues.description: GREAT SCOTT! The past present and future come crashing together as only BACK TO THE FUTURE can do it! Secrets between the McFly family and Doc Brown are revealed… and what happens to the inventions that don’t...

issues.name: Back to the Future #20
issues.description:
'HARD TIME' PART 2 
	As a secret passed through time threatens Marty and Doc... but what can they do to set things right without making everything worse?!

issues.name: Back to the Future #21
issues.description: 'HARD TIME' PART 3 The secret life of Jailbird Joey Baines starts to unravel as Marty uncovers a family mystery that goes deeper than he ever imagined... but what role did Doc Brown play in the crime that sent Joey to prison?...

issues.name: Back to the Future #25

issues.description: THE CONTINUM CONUNDRUM part 3 ! Doc and Marty are on the run-but Doc can't remember what he's doing and Marty's just happy to be back in the time-traveling adventure... until things start to go very, very wrong!...

issues.description: DIVE INTO THE FUTURE! The mystery of amnesiac Doc Brown's appearance in 1986 deepens as Marty hatches a plan to go further into the future than he's ever gone. But what did Clara's warning mean-and what can Marty...

data.name: Back to the Future: Biff to the Future

issues.name: Back to the Future: Biff to the Future #1  Subscription Variant
issues.description: When Old Biff Tannen travels to the past to give his younger self the Grays Sports Almanac, he opens a lethal Pandora's Box that drastically changes the course of history. In the BTTF movies, Doc and Marty save the day...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Biff to the Future #2
issues.description: “Biff Goes To Hollywood.” When you’re a famous young man with a bulging wallet and healthy libido, what do you do? You go to Hollywood, of course, and you chase beautiful women, hang out with movie stars…...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Biff to the Future #3
issues.description: 'Biff Goes To Town' They say you can never go home again, but no one told that to Biff Tannen. With a growing fortune and his eyes set on Hill Valley, Biff returns to claim the city and grow it in his toxic image...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Biff to the Future #4
issues.description: “Biff Goes To Washington” — Absolute power corrupts absolutely… and when you’re Biff Tannen, that’s exactly what you want! If money is the root of all evil, then Biff makes like a tree...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Biff to the Future #5
issues.description: It's the 1980s, and as Biff proceeds to remake the Hill Valley town square in his image, his personal conflicts with Lorraine McFly and her kids are reaching the boiling point. Meanwhile, the reclusive Emmett Brown is...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Biff to the Future #6
issues.description: 'Biff Goes To Hell' Welcome to Hell Valley! Looking to expand his empire, Biff's greatest threat to the planet is finally revealed. It's going to take the combined might of the McFlys to put a stop to Biff's...

data.name: Back to the Future: Citizen Brown

issues.name: Back to the Future: Citizen Brown #1
issues.description: Time-travelling into comics directly out of Telltale's 2010 smash-hit episodic video game BACK TO THE FUTURE: THE GAME! When an empty time-traveling DeLorean suddenly shows up in 1986, Marty McFly quickly learns that...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Citizen Brown #2
issues.description: Marty rescued Doc from the certain death back in 1931, but he might have doomed the McFly family in the process! It'll take 1.21 gigawatts and a little bit of luck to right the time stream and save Marty's future...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Citizen Brown #3  Subscription Variant
issues.description: Marty and Doc have outwitted the Tannen family, but at what cost? When the DeLorean speeds back to 1986, our heroes discover that Hill Valley is now a walled-in city held under the sway of the mysterious CITIZEN BROWN. And...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Citizen Brown #4  Subscription Variant
issues.description: Marty escapes the alternate present of 1986-B, fleeing back to 1931 to correct the time stream - all he has to do is break a couple of hearts. But one man sets out to stop him: Doc Brown! The future hangs in the balance!...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Citizen Brown #5
issues.description: GREAT SCOTT! With Doc and Marty opposing each other, it could be Hill Valley itself that pays the ultimate price, disappearing into the time-stream forever! Doc and Marty will need all the luck they can get before they're...

data.name: Back to the Future: Tales from the Time Train

issues.name: Back to the Future: Tales from the Time Train #1  Cover B Murphy Artist Edition
issues.description: It's 1893 and at last, Doc Brown fulfills his promise to Clara as he's completed the project he's been working on: the Time Train! But where in time and space will the Brown family go on their inaugural trip?...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Tales from the Time Train #2  Cover B Funko Wolfe
issues.description: Doc Brown has fulfilled his promise to Clara by completing his most ambitious project: the Time Train! Now, he has taken the whole family on a vacation to 1939 to the New York World's Fair. Unbeknownst to them, however,...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Tales from the Time Train #3  Cover B Murphy
issues.description: Finally! Find out what happens to Doc, Clara, and the whole family after the end of the third film! Doc and family venture deeper into the 1939 World's Fair as a case of mistaken identity leads one member of the Brown...

issues.name: Back to the Future: Tales from the Time Train #4  Cover B Murphy
issues.description: Doc and the Brown family venture ever deeper into the 1939 World's Fair as a case of mistaken identity puts Jules and Verne in the crosshairs of German spies!

issues.name: Back to the Future: Tales from the Time Train #5  Cover B Murphy
issues.description: With Jules and Verne held hostage by German spies, Doc and Clara must pull out all the stops to rescue their sons! Guest-starring Einstein! (Not that one... the other one!)

issues.name: Back to the Future: Tales from the Time Train #6  Cover B
issues.description: With Jules and Verne held hostage by German spies, Doc and Clara must pull out all the stops to rescue their sons! Guest-starring Einstein! (Not that one, the other one!)

issues.name: Black Widow #1
issues.description: S.H.I.E.L.D.'S MOST WANTED! The Eisner Award-winning team of Mark Waid and Chris Samnee are taking Black Widow on the lam! Natasha has spent years gathering secrets, and when some of the darkest ones begin mysteriously going...

issues.name: Black Widow #10
issues.description: Widow and Bucky barely escaped with their lives! There’s a Recluse on the loose, children playing with Lions, and a man on the moon. Is Widow weaving a masterful web, or are her threads starting to unravel?

issues.name: Black Widow #11
issues.description: While Widow's been collecting information, her enemy has been collecting allies. Natasha faces a full-scale invasion! What's the target? And can Widow shield it on her own?

issues.name: Black Widow #12
issues.description: IT ALL LEADS TO THIS! All the secrets… All the lies… All the vengeance… It all ends here.

issues.name: Black Widow #2
issues.description: It's S.H.I.E.L.D.'s funeral! As S.H.I.E.L.D.’s top brass gather to bury one of their own, they make an attractive target. Lucky for Maria Hill, the agency’s persona non grata, Black Widow, is still watching over them. But...

issues.name: Black Widow #3
issues.description: The Weeping Lion has Black Widow under his thumb. Until Natasha learns his true motivations, she's trapped playing his personal weapon and spy... He's controlling the best in the world, and sending her to the place she never...

issues.name: Black Widow #4
issues.description: THE SPY WHO WENT INTO THE COLD! Nearly dead after her last mission, Natasha struggles to complete her latest assignment from the Weeping Lion. But she’ll get by with a little help from old friends... although old enemies...

issues.name: Black Widow #5
issues.description: Using her darkest secret as leverage, the Weeping Lion has pushed Natasha further from the straight and narrow, and Agent Elder of S.H.I.E.L.D. is closing in — is he fellow prey that needs Black Widow’s protection, or another...

issues.name: Black Widow #6
issues.description: The Weeping Lion has released the Black Widow's most dangerous secret into the world. Now Natasha is on a collision course with the Invincible Iron Man!

issues.name: Black Widow #7
issues.description: Now that Natasha knows the Weeping Lion’s secret, she’s in control of his very particular set of skills. Natasha plans to use him to destroy the Red Room’s reincarnation, the Dark Room. But she’ll have to face Recluse, the...

issues.name: Black Widow #8
issues.description: DARK ROOM FIELD TRIP! Students of the Dark Room — the successor of the Red Room — are making their way into the world. One young assassin has her sights set on a VERY high-profile target. There’s no shortage of men prepared...

issues.name: Black Widow #9
issues.description: THE RETURN OF BUCKY BARNES!  Natasha’s living in a world without secrets, and Bucky’s got a pretty big one… You can’t go home again… particularly when there’s a deadly killer targeting you!

issues.name: Captain Marvel #19
issues.description: It's the long awaited return of Rick Jones' wife, Marlo. But her arrival may not be the upbeat event Rick had been hoping for...especially when the first thing Marlo tries to do is annihilate the new Captain Marvel!

issues.name: Captain Marvel #20
issues.description: In trying to head off the horrible fate awaiting Marlo, Marv begins an odyssey into the future, where he immediately discovers he's the only being in the universe capable of saving the Earth from a conquering, power-hungry...

issues.name: Captain Marvel #21
issues.description: OverviewThe Shi’ar, the Skrulls, and the Kree have faced many great obstacles in their conquest of the future Earth, but even they’re not prepared for the attack of the giant Captain Marvel... Yes, we said GIANT Captain...

issues.name: Captain Marvel #22
issues.description: Captain Marvel continues to defend future Earth against the Shi'ar/Kree/Skrull armada. But is the cure worse than the condition?

issues.name: Captain Marvel #23
issues.description: The Earth is destroyed! Humanity is gone! There is only one question: How will we be remembered? You may not like the answer. Guest-starring the Magus, Moondragon and Doctor Doom!

issues.name: Captain Marvel #24
issues.description: The most SHOCKING ENDING in years! Peter David's best Captain Marvel story to date concludes right here, with lasting ramifications for years to come!

issues.name: Champions #16
issues.description: CHAMPION FOR A DAY, PART 1 Following their staggering loss in their adventure with the Avengers, the Champions decide to double down on their mission to make the world a better place – but they know now they can’t do it...

issues.name: Champions #17
issues.description: CHAMPION FOR A DAY, PART 2 Red Locust is back, and she's brought some friends!  Meanwhile, the Champions' global influence is spreading -- but is that a good thing?

issues.name: Champions #18
issues.description: CHAMPION FOR A DAY, PART 3 The new order changeth!  After a series of tragic setbacks and shakeups, the Champions are faced with a grim decision - is it finally time to disband and give up the fight?

issues.name: Domino #1

issues.description: GOOD LUCK WITH THAT! You saw her on the silver screen, now Domino’s live and direct from the Mojoverse! Can you guess which special guest is along for the ride? The answer’s a real long shot…

issues.name: Domino #2
issues.description: UNLUCKY STARS    Marvel’s #1 soldier of fortune’s luck has finally gone south... turning her life as a mercenary upside down!  Plus: Who is Domino’s evil counterpart?  Guest-starring AMADEUS CHO!

issues.name: Domino #3
issues.description: GIRLS, GIRLS, GIRLS! DOMINO's luck is running out, and not just figuratively: Her powers are fading away! What good is our favorite soldier of fortune without the good fortune? She's got her back against the wall, but that...

issues.name: Domino #5

issues.name: Domino #6

issues.name: Domino #7

issues.name: Domino #8

issues.name: Domino #9
issues.description: STAY LOW AND KEEP FIRING! Domino's luck seems to have a mind of its own sometimes, whether her intentions are noble or not. A very SPECIAL GUEST arrives to show Domino how it's done!

issues.description: "MOJO RISING" The spineless showman takes center stage!  That's right - that most successful producer ever to pack the cross-time airwaves, the man himself, Mojo, has yet another plan in place the boost...

issues.name: X-Men: Black - Mystique #1  Salvador Larroca Mugshot Variant
issues.description: ONE SHORT DAY / DEGENERATION, PART THREE - THAT'S SO RAVEN! What's a day in the life for Raven Darkholme, A.K.A. Mystique? Brutal kills, revenge-fueled chills, seductive thrills...and that's all before breakfast! Award-winning...
